summary: REQ-2 is implemented by updating the AVAIL â€” The Nexus Effect card to render a static image instead of a link preview/embed. REQ-3 is not evidenced because no new static image asset was added under frontend/public/assets. REQ-1 is only partially supported by evidence: HeroSection now points to a hero background image path, but the requirement explicitly called for keeping the same src path in code and restoring the underlying asset content; the diff shows the src path in HeroSection.tsx being modified rather than confirming an asset-content restore.

missing_requirements.requirement: Hero section still uses the same src path currently referenced in frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSection.tsx, with the underlying asset content restored to the original hero background.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows HeroSection.tsx being modified to use src="/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png". This does not demonstrate that the same pre-existing src path was preserved and that only the underlying asset content was restored.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-provided image as a static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/ (or subfolder) and reference it via an absolute public path (e.g., /assets/...).
missing_requirements.reason: No files were added in the diff ("Added: 0"), so there is no evidence that the user-provided image was placed under frontend/public/assets/. Although SelectedSignalsSection references /assets/generated/avail-nexus-effect.dim_1600x900.png, the asset addition itself is not shown.
